data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
In the minute 3, Kansas City's Jaylin Lindsey attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Houston goal kick.
Free kick Kansas City.
In the minute 6, Kansas City's Johnny Russell is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
In Kansas City Kansas City attack through Johnny Russell. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 7, Goal kick for Houston at Children's Mercy Park.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Kansas City are caught offside.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Kansas City close to the penalty box.
Houston have a goal kick.
Joseph Dickerson awards Kansas City a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Christian Ramirez of Houston smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Alberth Elis.
In the minute 17, Darwin Quintero with an assist there.
Free kick in a good position for Kansas City!
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kansas City.
In the minute 24, Kansas City push upfield but Joseph Dickerson quickly pulls them for offside.
Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Matias Vera (Houston) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 26, Johnny Russell gets an equalizer for Kansas City. The score is now 1-1.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Johnny Russell.
Kansas Cityâ€™s Johnny Russell is on his feet again at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 33, Houston to take a throw-in in Kansas City territory.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Houston.
Corner awarded to Houston.
In the minute 37, Kansas City have a goal kick.
Gianluca Busio (Kansas City) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 40, Alberth Elis is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Alberth Elis is back on the pitch.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
In the minute 44, Christian Ramirez scores to make it 1-2 at Children's Mercy Park.
That's a fine assist from Alberth Elis.
Joseph Dickerson will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Houston are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Goal kick for Houston at Children's Mercy Park.
Free kick for Houston in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half has started.
Tab Ramos is making the team's first substitution at Children's Mercy Park with Niko Hansen replacing Alberth Elis.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Goal! Niko Hansen extends Houston's lead to 1-3.
Great play from Christian Ramirez to set up the goal.
In the minute 49, Goal! Kansas City reduce the deficit to 2-3 through Gadi Kinda.
Ball goes out of play for a Houston goal kick.
In Kansas City, Kansas City push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 55, Houston are pushing forward but Niko Hansen's finish is wide of the goal.
Joseph Dickerson awards Kansas City a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kansas City.
In the minute 56, Houston drives forward and Memo Rodriguez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Goal! Houston extend their lead to 2-4 through Darwin Quintero.
Darwin Ceren instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 58, The home team have replaced Roger Espinoza with Felipe Hernandez. This is the first substitution made today by Peter Vermes.
Peter Vermes (Kansas City) is making a second substitution, with Khiry Shelton replacing Gerso Fernandes.
Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 61, Houston take a comfortable 2-5 lead thanks to Darwin Quintero.
Niko Hansen instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 64, Felipe Hernandez of Kansas City gets in a strike, but is off target.
Joseph Dickerson awards Houston a goal kick.
Erik Hurtado is replacing Alan Pulido for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
The home team replace Johnny Russell with Daniel Salloi.
In the minute 66, Houston advance rapidly upfield but Joseph Dickerson blows for offside.
Mauro Manotas is replacing Christian Ramirez for Houston at Children's Mercy Park.
Tab Ramos (Houston) is making a third substitution, with Boniek Garcia replacing Darwin Quintero.
In the minute 68, Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Throw-in for Houston at Children's Mercy Park.
Can Kansas City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Houston's half?
In the minute 72, Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Peter Vermes is making the team's fifth substitution at Children's Mercy Park with Cameron Duke replacing Gadi Kinda.
Free kick for Houston in the half of Kansas City.
In the minute 75, Houston's Niko Hansen is whistled for offside at Children's Mercy Park.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 79, Throw-in Kansas City.
Houston make their fourth substitution with Tomas Martinez replacing Memo Rodriguez.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
In the minute 81, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kansas City.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Houston goal kick.
In the minute 85, Houston will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Kansas City.
Houston have a goal kick.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
In the minute 89, Corner awarded to Kansas City.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Winston Reid (Kansas City) strikes at Children's Mercy Park but his header is cleared.
Full-time! The final score is 2-5.
Nico Lemoine is replacing Darwin Ceren for the away team.
